alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 8:35AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northwestern Trumbull...Geauga...northeastern Cuyahoga...Lake and southern Ashtabula Counties Until 1000 AM EST.... At 835 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Middlefield to 8 miles north of Cleveland, moving east at 20 mph. This band will wobble across area with individual bursts of snow moving east at 20 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, South Russell, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Perry, Orwell, Burton, Highland Hills, Timberlake, West Farmington and Chesterland. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, 319, 320, 326, 330, and 331.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull
